body_html:
Looks like the issues have been fixed and related test cases have been added. After all, almost 7 months has passed since this PR was created. Related commits are as follows:

  • 645291f : Fix TfLite Convolution handle input_bacthe incorrectly for 1*1 kernel, and improve test coverage for conv ops.
  • 4902db8 : Fixes to hybrid conv. Add additional tests for pointwise conv.
  • 6995d2b : Fix convolution bug when input and filter dimensions match.

I will close this outdated PR. @aselle

body:
Looks like the issues have been fixed and related test cases have been added. After all, almost 7 months has passed since this PR was created.  Related commits are as follows:
- 645291feb9455c20c8d7296455403e895b5e0d1c : Fix TfLite Convolution handle input_bacthe incorrectly for 1*1 kernel, and improve test coverage for conv ops.
- 4902db818664b62f60c0f9572cc939f596d1c8bc : Fixes to hybrid conv. Add additional tests for pointwise conv.
- 6995d2b9be0e398f11a17348eb5b4745aee0af0d : Fix convolution bug when input and filter dimensions match.

I will close this outdated PR. @aselle
